title: How Many Calories Are in 8 oz Chicken Breast?

h1: How Many Calories Are in 8 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 8 oz â‰ˆ 227 g.

quick_answer.text: 8 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~375 kcal and ~70 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories are in 8 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 375 kcal for skinless, boneless, grilled or roasted.

faqs.q: How much protein in 8 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw would be higher due to water loss during cooking.

faqs.q: What affects calories in chicken breast the most?
faqs.a: Skin, added oils, breading, or sauces can significantly increase calories.

faqs.q: How does 8 oz compare to per 100 g chicken breast nutrition?
faqs.a: Per 100 g: 165 kcal, 31 g protein; 8 oz (227 g) scales up accordingly.
